story.title: The Story That Changed Everything
content: Our client was a successful luxury builder, but like most, he was stuck in the referral trap. Getting 2-3 leads per week on a good week, constantly wondering where the next project would come from.
Within 30 days of launching our Luxury Client Pipeline™, something unprecedented happened: 3 qualified appointments in a single day—more than he usually got in an entire week.

After seeing how effective our approach was, the client wanted to keep this unfair advantage exclusive to their company. But we couldn't keep something so valuable hidden away from other builders who desperately needed it.
Despite the incredible results we delivered, the client chose to end our engagement rather than allow us to help other luxury builders. On principle, apparently. Their loss is now your opportunity.
story.conclusion: That's why we now guarantee territory exclusivity—one builder per metro area, period.
